metadata.title: CVE-2020-10772 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12662 was shipped for Unbound in Red HatEnterprise Linux 7, as part of erratum RHSA-2020:2414. Vulnerable versionsof Unbound could still amplify an incoming query into a large number ofqueries directed to a target, even with a lower amplification ratiocompared to versions of Unbound that shipped before the mentioned erratum.This issue is about the incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12662, and it does notaffect upstream versions of Unbound.

criterions.comment: unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
